section.name: Hamilton Verissimo de Oliveira
section.p: Hamilton got involved with Avalon in 2003 while re-writing his pet project Polyethylene in a more componentized way. After his addiction he felt the necessity of an Avalon container for CLI (Mono and .Net environments) and has been working on it since then. In his TO-DO list there are things like adapt Fortress to Avalon Meta package, build a core for a truly distributed container using Jini and make containers in different plataforms to provide services to each other through SOAP or IIOP.
